generic-plugin.name: CobblerServerPlugin
generic-plugin.description: A plugin that integrates a Cobbler server into RHQ
generic-plugin.serverplugin:help: This plugin will periodically sync the RHQ content subsystem with that of a Cobbler server.

serverplugin:control.name: getCobblerDistros
serverplugin:control.description: Shows the distros known to Cobbler

c:simple-property.name: searchRegex
c:simple-property.description: If specified, only those distros whose name matches this regex will be returned

serverplugin:control.name: getCobblerProfiles
serverplugin:control.description: Shows the profiles known to Cobbler

c:simple-property.name: searchRegex
c:simple-property.description: If specified, only those profiles whose name matches this regex will be returned

serverplugin:control.name: removeCobblerDistros
serverplugin:control.description: Removes RHQ distros known to Cobbler. Any non-RHQ distros will remain intact.

c:simple-property.name: searchRegex
c:simple-property.description: If specified, only those distros whose name matches this regex will be removed

c:simple-property.name: enabled
c:simple-property.description: Determines whether or not Cobbler will be synchronized with RHQ content

c:simple-property.name: scheduleType
c:simple-property.description: Indicates the type of trigger this synchronize job will use

c:simple-property.name: scheduleTrigger
c:simple-property.description: Determines how often Cobbler will be synchronized with RHQ content. Based on the schedule type, this is either the period, in milliseconds, or the cron expression.

c:simple-property.name: concurrent
c:simple-property.description: This must always be false - only want one sync job running at a time

c:simple-property.name: clustered
c:simple-property.description: This must always be false - each RHQ server will run this job to sync their own Cobbler server

c:simple-property.name: url
c:simple-property.description: The URL where the Cobbler server is found

c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.description: The username that this plugin will use when logging into the Cobbler server

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: The password that this plugin will use when logging into the Cobbler server
